original_title: Quentin Tarantino reveals what his ‘best’ movie is | CNN
article_summary: Quentin Tarantino considers "Inglourious Basterds" his best work, "Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood" his favorite, and "Kill Bill" the ultimate Quentin Tarantino movie. He also mentioned some minor issues with early films like "Reservoir Dogs" and "Pulp Fiction."</s>
